Hi Caroline,


If you are changing all the glazing at once, you can simply scale the 
-av parameter value by the transmittance of your glazings and that will 
give you the correct relative changes.  In fact, excepting for angular 
variations in transmittance, you could scale your entire result under 
those circumstances.


-Greg
